sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-data-table>
            
        </v-data-table>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name:"CartComponent",
    data() {
        return {
            dialog: false,
            headers: [
                { text: 'Item Name', value: 'name' },
                { text: 'Price', value: 'price' },
                { text: 'Quantity', value: 'quantity' },
                { text: 'Actions', value: 'actions', sortable: false },
            ],
            items: [
                // Sample data, replace with your actual data
                { name: 'Item 1', price: 100, quantity: 2 },
                { name: 'Item 2', price: 200, quantity: 5 },
            ],
            newItem: {
                name: '',
                price: '',
                quantity: ''
            }
        };
    },
    methods: {
        addItem() {
            this.items.push({ ...this.newItem });
            this.newItem.name = '';
            this.newItem.price = '';
            this.newItem.quantity = '';
            this.dialog = false;
        }
    }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.headline {
    font-weight: bold;
}
</style>
